text: Josette is a 1938 American romantic comedy movie directed by Allan Dwan and starring Simone Simon, Don Ameche, Robert Young, Joan Davis, Paul Hurst, Bert Lahr, Lynn Bari, William Demarest, William Collier Sr., Lon Chaney Jr.. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1938 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Allan Dwan Category:Movies set in New Orleans
title: Josette (1938 movie)
